attributes.action: allow local authorities to determine for themselves the form of governance which best suits their  area and residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislation currently enacted compels local authorities to chose between an elected mayor or an elected leader model.  in each case the  incumbent has a term of office unaffected by local democracy.

We call on the Prime Minister to recognise that those elected at local level represent those people  and the authority to determine how a council should be governed should rest with the local council


Thus allowing choice between Elected mayor, cabinet or a return to a committee system

We are a diverse nation and that diversity should extend to our forms of local governance
